about_the_game:
Objective


The main objective of "Survive The Night" is simple but filled with challenges: survival. You will find yourself in an environment that may seem welcoming at first glance, but it hides many secrets. Your mission is to withstand the threats of the night, explore the world, and, through creativity and ingenuity, build a safe refuge for yourself.

Exploration


The world of "Survive The Night" is vast and full of secrets. Every nook and cranny holds valuable resources, mysterious creatures, and unique locations to discover. Explore dense forests, large and small cities, abandoned regions, and many other diverse environments while battling the enemies around you.

Crafting and Building




The key to survival is in your hands. Gather resources from nature, such as wood, stone, and minerals, and use them to create tools, weapons, and armor. Build impenetrable fortresses, prosperous villages, and advanced bases to withstand nighttime threats and protect your treasures.

Action




Survive The Night is not just about building. Creatures hunt relentlessly. Master combat skills, enhance your character, and equip yourself with powerful weapons and armor to face these threats. With a deep progression system, you can customize your playstyle and become a master of the art of survival.

Final Objective


Discover Secrets, Build Fortresses, and Master Survival!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Processor: Any CPU from the past 10 years or higher.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard Graphics Driver or Any GPU from the past 10 years or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 16:9 resolutions are supported at current moment.

short_description: Explore a vast world filled with hidden treasures and mysterious creatures, all while crafting powerful tools, weapons, and armor to build your fortress. Battle relentless foes, customize your character, and become the ultimate survival master. Are you up for the challenge?
